Description: Painted pottery shabti of Shedsukhons, chantress of Amun, with a blue lappet-wig, a modelled brown face with black and white eyes, a blue collar that surrounds the parallel brown hands in relief holding the two brown hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs on yellow ground; the back is decorated with a representation of a red and yellow seed-basket and mummy-bands.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
